City Council District D
=======================

![SMB_4669](http://www.levellandtexas.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6271)

Council Member Michael Stueart - District D
-------------------------------------------

Mayor Pro Tem
-------------

[councild@levellandtexas.org](mailto:councild@levellandtexas.org)
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Michael Stueart was elected to the City Council in May 2021. He currently serves as Mayor Pro Tem.

Council Member Stueart is married to Dianna and loves to serve this community. He currently works as a real estate agent, but previously owned Stueart's Pit Stop. He is a longtime member of the Levelland Noon Lions Club and attends First Baptist Church.
